A larger version of the Singularity Tank, Holds 1024 buckets worth of any liquid.
block.mob_grinding_utils.xpsolidifier.je: Solidifies Fluid XP using moulds to create edible xp jellies.
block.mob_grinding_utils.tinted_glass.je: Allows you to see the inside of the mob farm without letting light inside.
block.mob_grinding_utils.dreadful_dirt.j: Rapidly spawns monsters in the dark, will burn if exposed to the sky during the day.
A block of solidified experience, very bouncy, much fun.
block.mob_grinding_utils.delightfull_dir: Rapidly spawns creatures in the light, will snow-cap if exposed to the sky during the night.
Spawns Mobs in a 3x3x1 area.
Consumes XP Jellies.
Can be upgraded.
block.mob_grinding_utils.delightful_dirt: Will not function in ocean biomes and other biomes without passive mob spawns.

block.mob_grinding_utils.saw.tooltip_3: Mobs Mashed DO count as Player Kills.

block.mob_grinding_utils.spikes.tooltip_: Mobs killed by spikes DO NOT count as Player Kills.
block.mob_grinding_utils.entity_conveyor: Conveyor to move Mobs and Items along a Horizontal Vector.
Mobs Can Spawn on this Block.
block.mob_grinding_utils.ender_inhibitor: Inhibits Teleportation for Entities up to 8 Blocks away.
Can be attached on ANY side of Solid Blocks.
Inhibits Teleportation for Entities up to 8 Blocks away.
Can be attached on ANY side of Solid Blocks.
block.mob_grinding_utils.tinted_glass.to: Glass blocks designed to prevent light.

block.mob_grinding_utils.delightful_dirt: Will Snow-Cap at Night if Exposed to the Sky.
